meanings.definition: A man who is meticulously groomed and fashionable, typically living in an urban setting.
meanings.sent1: The metrosexuals in the city always dress impeccably.
meanings.sent2: Many metrosexuals enjoy shopping for stylish clothes.
meanings.sent3: The group of metrosexuals decided to have a fashion show in the park.
meanings.sent4: His apartment looked like a magazine cover, he was the king of the metrosexuals.
meanings.sent5: The metrosexuals' outfits were so trendy, they turned heads wherever they went.

meanings.definition: A person, typically a man, who is interested in fashion, grooming, and other traditionally feminine activities.
meanings.sent1: She was surprised to find out her brother was a metrosexual and enjoyed shopping for skincare products.
meanings.sent2: Some metrosexuals are skilled at applying makeup.
meanings.sent3: The metrosexuals at the salon were discussing the latest nail polish colors.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the metrosexual of the office, always offering fashion advice to his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The group of metrosexuals gathered to share tips on hair styling and skincare routines.
